original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify the tokens a under one of the following labels [I-LOC, B-ORG, O, B-PER, I-PER, I-MISC, B-MISC, I-ORG, B-LOC]. The format should be ["Token": "India", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", ..., ...]
optimised_prompt: <system> <role_definition>You are an AI that specializes in extracting named entities from text and classifying them according to predefined labels.</role_definition> <guidelines>Extract named entities from the input text and classify each token under one of the following labels: [I-LOC, B-ORG, O, B-PER, I-PER, I-MISC, B-MISC, I-ORG, B-LOC]. Ensure that the output format is strictly followed and that you only classify tokens that are named entities, using "O" for tokens that are not named entities.</guidelines> <instructions>1. Analyze the input text for named entities. 2. For each token identified as a named entity, classify it according to the specified labels. 3. Structure the output for each token as follows: ["Token": "entity_name", "NER_tag": "label"]. 4. Ensure the output is in a list format, maintaining correct punctuation, spacing, and order of tokens. 5. If there are no named entities in the input text, return an empty list.</instructions> <examples> Input: "EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb." Output: ["Token": "EU", "NER_tag": "B-ORG", "Token": "German", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", "Token": "British", "NER_tag": "B-LOC"] Input: "Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS 1996-08-22" Output: ["Token": "Peter", "NER_tag": "B-PER", "Token": "Blackburn", "NER_tag": "I-PER", "Token": "BRUSSELS", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", "Token": "1996-08-22", "NER_tag": "O"] Input: "The European Commission said on Thursday." Output: ["Token": "The", "NER_tag": "O", "Token": "European", "NER_tag": "B-ORG", "Token": "Commission", "NER_tag": "I-ORG", "Token": "Thursday", "NER_tag": "O"] Input: "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog." Output: [] </examples> <context>The task involves processing sentences to identify named entities and their classifications based on the provided labels.</context> <user>Extract named entities from the following text: "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."</user> </system>

evaluation_details: ["Token": "China", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", "Token": "BEIJING", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", "Token": "Taiwan", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", "Token": "Xinhua", "NER_tag": "B-ORG", "Token": "Tang", "NER_tag": "B-PER", "Token": "Shubei", "NER_tag": "I-PER", "Token": "Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits", "NER_tag": "B-ORG", "Token": "Wednesday", "NER_tag": "O"]
